VI.iii.2.B.1.c
.
Who Is Responsible for Determining Whether a Debt Exists
Claims processors are responsible for determining whether a debt exists in a beneficiary's account every time they process an award of compensation or pension.
Reference
:  For more information on how to locate A/R balances, see
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart iii, 2.B.2.a
.
